params._priceProvider: The address of ChainLink ETH/USD price feed contract
params._token: The address of stable ERC20 token contract

params.period: Option period in seconds (1 days <= period <= 4 weeks)

returns.settlementFee: Amount to be distributed to the HEGIC token holders
returns.strikeFee: Amount that covers the price difference in the ITM options

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner.     * NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

approve().notice: Allows the ERC pool contract to receive and send tokens

setMaxSpread(uint256).notice: Used for adjusting the spread limit

transferPoolOwnership().notice: Can be used to update the contract in critical situations        in the first 90 days after deployment

unlock(uint256).notice: Unlock funds locked in the expired options
